list.name: Default
list.comment: Added authors to model and logic. REST service for them made available. Model is still quite naive and REST interfaces are still to be improved.

task.summary: Added JPA with Hibernate vendor. As backend base, temporarily DebryDB in-memory Database.
Many changes. Architecture redesigned for JavaEE (EJB and JPA). Some examples of JAX-RS shown and works.
Simple REST architecture created! Simple journals and papers CRUDs are now handled. Aggressive programming mode -- no error checking at all!

MESSAGE.value: Added JPA with Hibernate vendor. As backend base, temporarily DebryDB in-memory Database.

Simple REST architecture created! Simple journals and papers are now handled.
Simple REST architecture created! Simple journals and papers CRUDs are now handled. Aggressive programming mode -- no error checking at all!
